'''Ideal Circumstance''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Sabz Meat Stew]] with [[Alhaitham]]. The [[recipe]] for Sabz Meat Stew is obtainable from [[Lambad]] at [[Lambad's Tavern]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

'''Ideal Circumstance''' restores '''40'''% of a character's Max HP and also restores an additional '''2,350''' HP. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
